    • 方法详细资料

      • getRootFolder

        Folder getRootFolder(java.lang.String token)
                     throws PathNotFoundException,
                            RepositoryException,
                            DatabaseException
        Obtain the root folder of the repository.
        返回:
        A folder object with the repository root node properties.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no root folder node in the repository.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • getTrashFolder

        Folder getTrashFolder(java.lang.String token)
                      throws PathNotFoundException,
                             RepositoryException,
                             DatabaseException
        Obtains the user trash folder.
        返回:
        A folder object with the user trash node properties.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no user trash folder node in the repository.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • getTrashFolderBase

        Folder getTrashFolderBase(java.lang.String token)

        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException
        RepositoryException
        DatabaseException

        抛出:

        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

                           throws PathNotFoundException,
                                  RepositoryException,
                                  DatabaseException

        A folder object with the categories folder node properties.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no user documents folder node in the repository.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • purgeTrash

        void purgeTrash(java.lang.String token)
                throws PathNotFoundException,
                       AccessDeniedException,
                       LockException,
                       RepositoryException,
                       DatabaseException
        Remove all the items in the user trash folder for ever. You can't recover this items any more.
        抛出:
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the user deleted folders and documents because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        PathNotFoundException
        LockException
        DatabaseException

      • getUpdateMessage

        java.lang.String getUpdateMessage(java.lang.String token)
                                  throws RepositoryException
        Get the update message, if any.
        返回:
        A possible update message or simple info for the application.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.

      • getRepositoryUuid

        java.lang.String getRepositoryUuid(java.lang.String token)
                                   throws RepositoryException
        Get the unique repository identifier
        返回:
        The repository UUID
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.

      • hasNode

        boolean hasNode(java.lang.String token,
              java.lang.String path)
                throws RepositoryException,
                       DatabaseException
        Test if a node path exists
        参数:
        path - The node path to test
        返回:
        true if the node exist or false if not
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • getNodePath

        java.lang.String getNodePath(java.lang.String token,
                           java.lang.String uuid)
                             throws PathNotFoundException,
                                    RepositoryException,
                                    DatabaseException
        Obtain the node path with a given uuid.
        参数:
        uuid - An unique node identifier
        返回:
        The path of the node with the given uuid
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no user node in the repository with this uuid.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • getNodeUuid

        java.lang.String getNodeUuid(java.lang.String token,
                           java.lang.String path)
                             throws PathNotFoundException,
                                    RepositoryException,
                                    DatabaseException
        Obtain the node uuid with a given path.
        参数:
        path - An unique path node identifier
        返回:
        The path of the node with the given uuid
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no user node in the repository with this uuid.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • getAppVersion

        AppVersion getAppVersion(java.lang.String token)
                         throws RepositoryException,
                                DatabaseException
        Retrieve application version.
        参数:
        token - Security token.
        返回:
        Application version.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException
        DatabaseException
